mapper.sql: /* commonSearchColumns */ `no` AS "no", title AS title, user_id AS userId, classification AS classification, use_yn AS useYn, content AS content, file_name as fileName, file_path as filePath, file_size as fileSize, created AS created, lastmodified AS lastModified

/* procSearch */
AND (SELECT value FROM portaldb.code_detail cd WHERE cd.key = classification AND cd.group_id = 'DOCUMENTS_CLASSIFICATION') LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND title LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND user_id LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
AND (title LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword},'%') OR user_id LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword},'%') OR (SELECT value FROM portaldb.code_detail cd WHERE cd.key = classification AND cd.group_id = 'DOCUMENTS_CLASSIFICATION') LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword},'%'))
AND (title LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword},'%') OR file_name LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword},'%') OR (SELECT value FROM portaldb.code_detail cd WHERE cd.key = classification AND cd.group_id = 'DOCUMENTS_CLASSIFICATION') LIKE concat('%', #{searchKeyword},'%'))
AND 1=1
AND created >= STR_TO_DATE(#{searchStartDate}, '%Y/%m/%d')
AND STR_TO_DATE(#{searchEndDate}, '%Y/%m/%d')+1 > created
AND use_yn = #{searchTypeUseYn}
AND 1=1
mapper.select:
/* Documents.getDocument */ SELECT , (SELECT value FROM portaldb.code_detail cd WHERE cd.key = classification AND cd.group_id = 'DOCUMENTS_CLASSIFICATION') as classificationValue
FROM documents WHERE 1=1 AND NO = #{no}
mapper.insert: /* Documents.insertDocument */ INSERT INTO documents (title, user_id, classification, use_yn, content, file_name, file_path, file_size, created, lastmodified) values( #{title}, #{userId}, #{classification}, #{useYn}, #{content}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, now(), now() );
mapper.update:
/* Documents.updateDocument */ UPDATE documents SET
title = #{title},
user_id = #{userId},
classification = #{classification},
use_yn = #{useYn},
content = #{content},
file_name = #{fileName}, file_path = #{filePath}, file_size = #{fileSize},
lastModified = now() WHERE 1=1
AND `no` = #{no}
